title: Student of the Year 2
summary: The biggest franchise of Bollywood returns with Student Of The Year 2 starring the incredible Tiger Shroff and introducing - Tara and Ananya. Friendship, sportsmanship, love, companionship - it's all in for the Student Of The Year.

reviews.content:
Good romantic-action-drama.After watching the movie "Baaghi" i started to kinda like Bollywood movie, so i try some of them on Netflix.They are different , in a good way: with a mix of romance, actions, stunts and dance.
Entertaining.Good romantic-action-drama.After watching the movie "Baaghi" i started to kinda like Bollywood movie, so i try some of them on Netflix.They are different , in a good way: with a mix of romance, actions, stunts and dance.Entertaining. Ananya and Tiger are both stunning and work well togheter

It's worst movie with no subject and acting. Only tiger's dancing skills is good.
